Projects

A small collection of my personal work.

QuaverEd Trial System

https://www.quavered.com/preview/

2021

A system that generates 30-day trials to all four products (QuaverMusic, QuaverSEL, QuaverPre-K, and QuaverHealth) - integrated with third party email system, allowing marketing to control email contents. Built with Laravel, Vue, MySQL, Google Analytics (to track all trials to eventual sales), and Campaign Monitor.

QuaverEd

https://www.quavered.com/

2020

A complete redesign and rebrand of QuaverEd - complete with a unified login and registration experience across brands/products.

James E. Walker Library

https://library.mtsu.edu/

2018

A complete refresh of the Library's entire web presence to closely match the design principles of the University while catering to the needs of the patrons. Built on a Library-specific CMS (SpringShare LibGuides).

'Vessel Insurance' Theme

https://vessel.titaninswebsites.com/

2018

A complete and highly customizable WordPress theme, built for insurance agencies. The theme shrunk overall development time for each site by over 80%.

Vintage Burkitt Station

https://vintageburkittstation.com/

2018

A complete custom design and website build, given customer specifications and requirements. Includes blog and custom form.

Premier Turf Management

https://mygreenyard.com/

2018

A complete custom design and website build, given customer specifications and requirements. Includes Instagram integration and contact form.
